quotes.quote: Shaving your head is acceptable. It's when you start wearing toupees and brushing your hair over that things go wrong.
Experience has taught me, when I am shaving of a morning, to keep watch over my thoughts, because, if a line of poetry strays into my memory, my skin bristles so that the razor ceases to act.
Shaving may help you look good but shaving your ego  may help you look even better.
Upon shaving off one's beard. The scissors cut the long-grown hair; the razor scrapes the remnant fuzz. Small-jawed, weak-chinned, bug-eyed, I stare at the forgotten boy I was.
Shaving is a way to start the workday by ritually not cutting your throat when you’ve the chance.
If it's a pain in the ass, you're shaving the wrong place.
The punishment of shaving a woman's head had biblical origins. In Europe, the practice dated back to the Dark Ages with the Visigoths.
One should refrain from contempt for the baser specimens of humanity, for whom liberation amounts to shaving the heads of women who have slept with Germans.
Though it's a small price to pay, shaving my head has opened more doors than I ever thought possible.
Since I have dealt in suds, I could never discover more than two reasons for shaving; the one is to get a beard, the other is to get rid of one.
I hate shaving. It's much easier to just do a little stubble, but my wife and daughter like it when I'm clean-shaven. If you see me with a clean face, then you know I'm in the kissing mode!
The secret of a long marriage is shaving your legs every day .  . because it shows you still care.
Now the Earth's face is lathered white with shaving soap. It's a long time till the razor once more makes its face smooth and fresh and green.
You know, I would date, if I could find a man worth shaving my legs for.
Winning is like shaving - you do it every day or you wind up looking like a bum.
Getting ideas is like shaving; if you don't do it every day, you're a bum.
I thoroughly believe that shaving is the best way of hair removal, as it's the most convenient and hassle free of all the methods.
The thing about breaking up when you get older, you just don't have the steam anymore. 'Oh, that's it. I can't start shaving my legs above the knee again.'
